__e: Only, Ivy has a basket of kitchen things to carry and it will be a bit of a squash for her and me and the basket in the front.
Ivy lied about who she was, she manipulated my mother while she lay dying, and she stole our apartment.
Whatever happened in that house it doesn't change the fact that Ivy's been damaged.
So, Ivy came through for us again, huh?
Yes, it must have been hard for you when Ivy died.
